message: Let's make a deal. I believe this is a fair starting point.
Let's meet in the middle, considering the inflation!
The inflation is hitting you harder than me, Bob. Let's be reasonable and close to our original positions.
Inflation is biting, I need a bit more to make up for it. This is my best offer so far!
Bob, this is a compromise considering the inflation. It's better to take this deal than risk losing even more in the next round.
